Title: Earthquake destruction and the reduction of disaster popularization charts
Notes: "Earthquake destruction and the reduction of disaster popularization charts" (地震灾害与减灾科普挂图) is a 12-poster series published in 1992 by the National Seismological Administration.Entitled "Continued disasters - Disaster expands" (续发灾害 灾情扩大), the poster shows the additional destructive effects of an earthquake: flooding, fires, collapsing bridges, etc.
